scripts.venv: pip install virtualenv --break-system-packages && virtualenv venv && chmod +x venv/bin/activate && . venv/bin/activate && venv/bin/pip install -e .[dev,worker,redis,mongodb,trace]
scripts.generate: rm -r venv && npm run venv && venv/bin/pip install fastapi uvicorn && venv/bin/pip freeze > requirements.txt
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop secator-worker; docker rm secator-worker
scripts.docker:stop-redis: docker stop redis; docker rm redis
scripts.docker:stop-mongodb: docker stop mongodb; docker rm mongodb
scripts.docker:start-deps: npm run docker:start-mongodb; npm run docker:start-redis
scripts.docker:stop-deps: npm run docker:stop-mongodb; npm run docker:stop-redis
scripts.docker:start-all: npm run docker:start-deps; npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:stop-all: npm run docker:stop-deps; npm run docker:stop
